flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: i want to make a half disco ball that has blinking red and white led lights. the half ball will be hollowed out and all the circuits and wires will go in side. i will put holes in the ball for the leds stick out. then i will glue them. i will hae a batter
guide.title: Making Circuits
